name: DUFE: Epilogue Ficlets
description:
Three delicious short stories for your enjoyment, each taking place in a different spot in the  Deliver Us From Evil (DUFE) timeline, and each with their own particular flavour.    We hope you enjoy reading them as much as our writers enjoyed writing them!

3 in 1 spicy epilogue ficlets package!

Play the base game here: https://galengames.itch.io/dufe

Nephilim's Embrace (Keldran x MC): Takes place after the events of DUFE: Candenza. What will it be like living with a lord on Earth? A saucy tale of Ariel exploring the boundaries of pleasure with Lord Keldran.  (Mature content)

Waves and Wars (Ace x MC): After falling in love with the bad boy how will Ace and Ariel live their lives? A jolly romp through the Mediterranean with Ace and the main character after the conclusion of the Ace Route. (Mature content)

Unusual Way (Keldran x Ace): Before the events of DUFE these two knew each other intimately. What was their last parting like? A steamy exploration of Ace and Keldran’s relationship. (Mature content)

The ficlets will be available later on Ko-fi for individual purchase!
